title: Five-year-old shot in Bertie County
content:
A five-year-old child is shot Sunday afternoon in Lewiston, according to Bertie County Sheriff John Holley.
The sheriff says the child has non-life-threatening injuries.
Holley tells WITN that they are still investigating the circumstances regarding how and why the child was shot.
Stay with WITN as this story develops.
